ISSUE.TITLE: Selecting speed on add Circuit Termination causes form to be wiped
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.3 ### Python Version 3.12 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Create a new circuit, fill in any values 2. Click Add for Termination A (or Termination Z) 3. Select Termination Type > DCIM > Site 4. Select Site (any) 5. Click the down arrow next to Port speed and select a value 6. Form is refreshed and previous values are blanked out (including Port speed) ### Expected Behavior The form should not erase previously input values. ### Observed Behavior Form is reset to default/blank. This happens in the NetBox demo.
